examples: a dry climate kind to asthmatics
hot summer pavements are anything but kind to the feet
our neighbor was very kind about the window our son broke

results.definition: a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality
examples: what kinds of desserts are there?

results.definition: having or showing a tender and considerate and helpful nature; used especially of persons and their behavior
examples: kind words showing understanding and sympathy
thanked her for her kind letter
